name: Gorgon: Scary - Survival Horror Game
description:
STORY

The family, who used to live a quiet life in their luxury mansions in the forest, left their old lives after their daughter was born and started a humble life in the city. Nobody around them could understand their behavior. Parents who had to go to work every day needed someone to take care of their daughters and that was Russell. There was only one rule the family told Russell: Don't go into the forest!

One day, when they are cycling near the forest, Russell missed the girl for a moment and saw her heading into the forest. While he is riding fast in the forest to catch up, he gets lost and finds himself in an environment he never knew.   

 

GORGON'S FEATURES

Are you ready to experience one of the best horror games?

You will find yourself in the middle of a gripping story in a truly scary and creepy first-person horror game. You didn't know that when a wealthy family was commissioned to take care of their daughters, you would be left alone in fear and panic. One moment you missed it and you see their daughter going away going deep into the forest, and there is only one rule spoken by the family: don't go into the forest! Now you have to bear the consequences to outlast.

You'll feel the tension and action to the fullest in the gripping horror story where mysterious events take place. When you see petrified people, you will have goosebumps and you will strive harder to survive. In the spooky atmosphere, if you do not want to share the same fate, you have to keep your eyes open and find the hints. Sometimes things will happen that you wouldn't want to see and you will need eye patches. If you don't use it wisely, you can witness terrible events. You should listen carefully to the voices around you, even the most unimportant sound can help you find the girl and save your life. Remember! One wrong move can lead you to death.

Do you like horror games, adventure, and tension? Do you enjoy gloomy, dark, and evil environments?  Gorgon is the game for you.

Features of the horror game Gorgon:

•             Exciting horror experience

•             3d horror game

•             Eye-catching graphics

•             Immersive story

•             Challenging and unique puzzles

•             Spooky sound effects and a terrifying atmosphere

Note: We recommend playing with headphones for a better experience.

If you have great ideas and suggestions for improving the game, you can reach us via e-mail and social networks. Do not hesitate to contact us, we look forward to your suggestions.
